DOC.detailed_description: The objective work compare effect two balance training program , one Nintendo Wii Fit-based traditionally-based without use gaming system , balance , functionality cognition patient Parkinson´s disease . It prospective , single blind , randomize clinical trial perform Brazil Parkinson Association Center Research course Speech Therapy , Physical Therapy Occupational Therapy São Paulo University . 32 patient Parkinson´s disease stag 1 2,5 Hoehn e Yahr participate work . Patients randomize control experimental group , 16 one . Both group perform 14 training session , twice week , seven week . Each session compose 30 minute-global-exercise series include stretch , muscle strengthen axial mobility exercise . After , group perform 30 minute balance training : control group perform balance exercise without external cue , visual auditory feedback cognitive stimulation ; experimental group perform balance training 10 Wii Fit game stimulate motor cognitive function . The main outcome measure : ( 1 ) Unified Parkinson´s Disease Rating Scale ( UPDRS ) ; ( 2 ) Berg Balance Scale ( BBS ) ; ( 3 ) Unipedal Stance Test ( UST ) ( 4 ) Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) . The statistical analysis do repeat measure ANOVA order ass possible difference among analyzed variable . Both group show improvement section II UPDRS , BBS , UST MoCA .
